name: Skilled
description: You gain 8 [SKILL POINTS], each time you choose this Perk again the [INT] requirement is 2 higher.

name: Expert
description: You improve 2 skills by 2 ranks and increase the maximum rank of those skills by 2. If a lore or tool skill was chosen, the current rank and maximum rank is increased by 4 instead.

name: Animal Person
description: TODO ... prob something with mounted combat

name: Athlete
description: Your long jump distance increases by 0.5m for every Rank in [ATHLETICS] you have, and your high jump distance by half of that. Additionally you gain the climb(1.5m) and swim(1.5m) speeds.

name: Con Artist
description: Poisons, Magic or other Supernatural means can’t compell you to diverge important secrets/ information you want to withhold.

name: Detective
description: You have advantage on any [D20 TEST] to resist or decipher illusions.

name: Bully
description: For 1 [AP] you can target a creature within 9m (6 squares). Make a [CHA] [INTIMIDATION] [SKILL TEST] against the targets [WILLPOWER] on a success that target is [FRIGHTENED] until the end of your next turn. If the creature is a lower [LEVEL] than you, you have [ADVANTAGE] on the [SKILL TEST], if the [SKILL TEST] fails the target it is immune to this ability for 1 hour.

name: Doctor
description: You have [ADVANTAGE] on any [MEDICINE] [SKILL TEST] when using a medi-kit. Additionally when you perform a long rest creatures in your party heal additional [HP] equal to your Ranks in [MEDICINE] .

name: Infiltrator
description: If you are targeted by an [RANGED ATTACK] from further than 6m away your [DODGE] is 5 higher. Additionally you are not slowed down while hidden.

name: Explorer
description: Your party ignores 1 Travel speed penalty of Terrains and the first time you have to spend [STAMINA] because of travel you don’t need to spend [STAMINA].

name: Thief
description: Picking Locks or disarming traps costs now 1 [AP] less (min 1 [AP]) and you can now also disarm magical traps by making an [INT] [THIEVERY] [SKILL TEST].
